titleStmt.title: A declaration made by the Earl of Nevv-Castle, Governour of the town and county of New-Castle: and generall of all His Majesties forces raised in the northern parts of this kingdom, for the defence of the same. For his resolution of marching into Yorkshire. As also, a just vindication of himself from that unjust aspersion laid upon him, for entertaining some popish recusants in his forces.
titleStmt.author: Newcastle, William Cavendish, Duke of, 1592-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: First printed at York, and now re-printed at London; By speciall command,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
